periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly sunny. High near 93, with temperatures falling to around 91 in the afternoon. Heat index values as high as 111. West wind around 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Partly Cloudy

periods.name: Tuesday
